name: I am Hera
description:
I am marriage.
Not just a goddess,
I'm their queen.
I am marriage:
the one whom women seek.
I am married.
I should be loved;
but my husband is faithless.

I am Hera,
and many god wrath.
I take seriously my vows,
and suffer not fools in my path.
I am Hera,
and I sent Hercules abroad.
I helped Jason in his task,
and by men am I awed.
I am Hera,
and I will not be played the fool.

- Publish the work that you collect through your social media account by including the credit of the creator's name.

- You have the right to print the work and it is strictly forbidden to sell and trade in physical form.

Regards
Riff as Destroyxstairs
